message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can always negotiate further if you don't like it.
You took 90%, now it's my turn to be aggressive. I'll take 70%
Okay, let's be reasonable.  I'll take 60% and you get 40%.  That's a fair compromise, considering the inflation we're both facing.
I'm not giving up yet. I'll take 55% and you can have the rest. It's getting late, and I'm not sure I want to play anymore.
